Reviews.Title: Instructions:
Reviews.Author: dichi
Reviews.Content: There are two function buttons. The one closest to the camera hole is designated REC. The other one is inboard of the REC button  and designated ON/OF  1. The device has a built-in rechargeable battery that needs to be fully charger when the device is new.  2. Make sure to insert  a MicroSD card before using the device.  3. Press and hold ON/OF to turn on the device.  The yellow LED will turn on , which means the device is in STANDBY mode.  4.  Press and hold REC to start recording video. The yellow LED will blink fast three times, then  turn off. This means  that during video recording, the LED is not lit, which makes it less likely to be spotted.  5. Press REC to pause video recording and save the recording to that point. The LED will turn on. The device is now  is STANDBY mode. In STANDBY mode, press  REC to take a still image. To continue recording press and hold REC.  6. To record a still image: Turn on the devise by pressing and holding ON/OF to enter  STANDBY mode. The LED will turn on. Press REC to record a single still image. The LED will flash. Press REC for another image.  7. To set the data/time of the devise, which is used to timestamp media recordings, create a text file in the root of the  MicroSD card with a file name of TAG. TXT. Open the file and add the following three lines: (date)  2009/10/22.  03:45:00  Replace the data and time above with the values you want. Save the file. Turn the devise off, then back on to reset the clock based on the text file.  8. To turn off  the devise, press and hold ON/OF until the LED goes out.  9. The device powers off  by itself after a period of inactivity.  10. It’s not necessary to power on the device to access  recorded media via the USB cable.  11.  If the device stops functioning, use the reset button to reset the  device. The reset button is recessed inside the small hole between the  MicroSD  card and the USB potr.

Reviews.Title: Not All Cameras Are Created Equal
Reviews.Author: Spartan
Reviews.Content: Beauty is in the eyes of the beholder. Lesson learned ~ not all cameras are created equal. Seems there are many versions of these cameras with varying degree of quality. The one I received seems to be version #3. The date stamp that comes with the camera is "01/01/2008". The most current version seems to be version #16. Knowing what I know today, I would never buy a 808 Car Key Camera without knowing and being able to verify the version #. Want to know more about the different camera types, visit Chuck Lohr or check youtube "808#16". Editing the TAG file in the root will update the date and time. Translation to English was fairly bad but after watching a youtube video, I figured it out. The quality on my camera is ok, as a toy.

Reviews.Title: Great mini camera for model rockets.
Reviews.Author: j lin
Reviews.Content: Great product for the price, I currently own 2 GO Pro 3 Black addition that have amazing features but are just to heavy for model rockets. I needed something that was light, easy to use, and disposable. After seeing the reviews I decided to go ahead and purchase, again I needed something light and disposable just in case it destroyed or lost and this item was my solution. The video quality is good, the sound quality is even more impressive I was able to record audio in a large open area and not loose a sound or word, but it is no GO Pro 3. I do recommend this product but again if you want high definition video with cool features you will need to buy something else, as that old saying goes "You get what you pay for".

Reviews.Title: parts missing
Reviews.Author: mike brown
Reviews.Content: The title clearly said it came with a 8GB Mirco SD Card& Retail Box i did NOT GET the sd card with it.i paid a higher price for this thinking i would get what i ordered , there is a lot more that cost less on Amazon with out the card i should have ordered one of them.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: stephen scott
Reviews.Content: I lost the disk the first day it sticks oout the side and everything got caught on it, therefore I don't know if it worked or guality.

Reviews.Title: Not as Advertised!
Reviews.Author: Ricky A. Dufour "bongoman"
Reviews.Content: The camera is OK but DOES NOT come with the advertised 8 GB micro card. The price is almost double what you would pay without the card. Not Good.

Reviews.Title: The video quality was great. But broke in my pocket.
Reviews.Author: druckin
Reviews.Content: The video quality is very high quality on this item, however it is a key chain. It came apart into pieces in my pocket just from the torque of my key ring. There are two super tiny screws holding the two halves of this item together. That's it. Also when it fell apart I noticed that there was a huge battery inside that really was just crammed in there held by no brackets or anything. Just loose. Due to the tiny screw being stripped out of the inferior plastic, it was impossible for me to fix. I just threw it away rather than try to save this item.

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: Winemaker9 "Winemaker9"
Reviews.Content: opened box, missing card that was supposed to come with it.  Plugged it in to charge, no LED lights, tried another port, nogo.  Tried one of my known good cables, still nothing.  Left it plugged in 6 hours just in case, absolutely nothing.  Returning.

Reviews.Title: complete waste of money!!!
Reviews.Author: Sir Steamer Service
Reviews.Content: SD card does not work, card reader in the unit does not work, put the SD card in the phone to see if it's my computer phone won't read the card either, tried another 8gb mini sd card form my phone, unit won't read it either.

Reviews.Title: Mini Car Key Camera Micro Spy Keychain DVR Video Reocorder Hidden
Reviews.Author: Vac
Reviews.Content: The product is not bad. My nephew is enjoying it with his airplane and bike. Easy to set up with PC and change date and time. All instructions there are in YouTube. Quality of video is good for this price.

Reviews.Title: Good For what it is.....
Reviews.Author: Bud_Hunter
Reviews.Content: Cant beat it for the price.It does as described, but is hard to change the date and time. Sound is great, surprisingly. Video is not 720p, its 480p at best.Seems to be good construction overall and is easy to operate.All in all, not a bad deal

Reviews.Title: wasted money
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: The product is  extremely difficult to setup. The instructions are supplied using broken English and poor grammar.  The entire presentation of the product suggests it is of ultra low quality. Save your money and try something else.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!!!
Reviews.Author: Raster
Reviews.Content: this spy micro camera works so good!! i can recomment this product,the camera have a good resolution too, so many  thank you!!!

Reviews.Title: Very nice surprise
Reviews.Author: Hector Martin Yanez Banos
Reviews.Content: My expectations were very low based on pricing alone and so I was very surprised with the quality of the video. It looks very well on sunny scenes. The resolution is SD and it comes with the advertised microSD card but this is not installed and very easy to overlook when opening the box.Sliding this tiny card is somehow tricky and I just ended up sliding it in in the right aperture (there is only one in the case) but below the electronics board. Fortunately it just required some gentle shaking to take it out.The video format is non compliant as I could watch it on a Mac bot not with the trusty VLC program.I consider this a very good buy.

Reviews.Title: I doesn't work properly
Reviews.Author: Heber Luis Prieto
Reviews.Content: I received them and they didn't work since the first day. Still trying to make the corrupt avi files work.

Reviews.Title: The micro SD card
Reviews.Author: bodasm@yahoo.com
Reviews.Content: The micro SD card was not included in my shipment.  I may return the product. It costs money to buy a SD crd

Easy connection with PC/Laptops, no driver needed. And playback videos on your PC.
Can be used as USB storage device
